snippet: FRANKFURT--Ruth. The congregation of Westchester Reform Temple mourns the death of a member from its founding generation, a former vice president and veteran teacher, and extends sympathy to her bereaved family. Helene K. Gray, President Jonathan E. Blake, Rabbi Jill Abramson, Cantor 1/3
lead_paragraph: FRANKFURT--Ruth. The congregation of Westchester Reform Temple mourns the death of a member from its founding generation, a former vice president and veteran teacher, and extends sympathy to her bereaved family. Helene K. Gray, President Jonathan E. Blake, Rabbi Jill Abramson, Cantor 1/3
